Action.Condition: 0 = select count() from dialogparameter where parametername = "UID_PROPOSED_OWNER"

ActionSequence.Condition: 0 = select count() from dialogparameterset Where objectkeyusedby = (from attestationcase select Current xobjectkey)

FillDialogParameter.Name: from attestationcase select current display()
FillDialogParameter.WhereClause: primarykey()= ( select current primarykey() from attestationcase)

ActionSequence.Condition: 0 = select count() from dialogparameter where parametername = "UID_PROPOSED_OWNER" and uid_dialogparameterset = (select uid_dialogparameterset from dialogparameterset where objectkeyusedby = (from attestationcase select current xobjectkey))

Label.Text: translate("#LDS#Approve this attestation case to confirm that you are the owner of this business object. If you are not the correct owner, you can assign a different owner.")

Function.Name: GetParameterDescription()
Function.Expression: translate("#LDS#If the selected owner for the business object is not correct, select the correct owner.")
